      • updateNumberOfCurrentVisitor

        public int updateNumberOfCurrentVisitor(java.lang.String parkId,
                                        int delta)
        update the numberOfCurrentVisitor in Park
        Parameters:
        parkId - the Id of the wanted Park
        delta - the number of visitor to increase or reduce
        Returns:
        the number of new visitors in the Park
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the newValue = oldValue + delta is
        lower than 0 or greater than the capacity

        Parameters:
        parkId - the Id of the wanted Park
        numToCheck - number of visitors that want to enter
        Returns:
        true if adding this many visitors not exceeding the capacity
        false otherwise
